metadataAttributes.Title: Cloud Computing Law Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Learn how the Law Regulates the Cloud. Master the main legal and regulatory implications of using and providing cloud computing services.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Cloud Services, General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), Cybersecurity, Contract Law, Cloud Computing, Intellectual Property, Contract Negotiations, Cybersecurity Regulation, International Transfers of Personal Data, Competition Law, Law Enforcement Access, Tax,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Christopher Millard ,Chris Reed ,Johan David Michels ,Ian Walden ,Dimitra Kamarinou ,Jessica Shurson ,Vasiliki Koukoulioti ,
